last_episode_to_air.name: The King
last_episode_to_air.overview: Insider accounts of Ram Niranjan's behavior in jail, plus a closer look at his history, point to his delusions and desires around reality and power.

name: Indian Predator: The Diary of a Serial Killer
original_name: इंडियन प्रीडेटर: एक सीरियल किलर की डायरी
overview: When a suspect is found in a journalist's murder, the case is considered closed until a secret diary suggests 13 more victims — and possible cannibalism.

episodes.name: The Murderer
episodes.overview: Police identify a decapitated body as a missing reporter and trace calls to a suspect who makes an unsettling confession — but there's more to his story.

episodes.name: The Cannibal
episodes.overview: Names written in Ram Niranjan's diary suggest a grim pattern. As experts discuss his potential motives for murder, he shares his own side of the story.

episodes.name: The King
episodes.overview: Insider accounts of Ram Niranjan's behavior in jail, plus a closer look at his history, point to his delusions and desires around reality and power.
